member.name: IThumbnailCache.GetThumbnail
member.summary: Gets a cached thumbnail for a given Shell item.
member.param: A pointer to the Shell item for which to retrieve a thumbnail.
The requested thumbnail size in pixels. The maximum value is 1024.
A combination of values from the enumeration. See the Remarks section for rules and a list of possible combinations.
The address of an pointer that, when this method returns successfully, receives the object used to access the thumbnail. This parameter may be NULL.

param.name: pOutFlags
param.para: A pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives a combination of the following flags from the WTS_CACHEFLAGS enumeration.
0x00000001. Set when the returned bitmap dimensions are less than cxyRequestedThumbSize.
0x00000002. Set when the returned image is in the cache.

member.param: A pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives a unique ID for the returned thumbnail. This parameter may be NULL, in which case the thumbnail ID is discarded.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or a standard COM error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The Shell item does not support thumbnail extraction. For example, .exe or .lnk items.
The extraction took longer than the maximum allowable time. The extraction was not completed.
A surrogate process was not available to be used for the extraction process.
The WTS_FASTEXTRACT flag was set, but fast extraction is not available.

member.name: IThumbnailCache.GetThumbnailByID
member.summary: Gets a thumbnail from the thumbnail cache, given its ID.
member.param: The ID of the thumbnail to retrieve. The ID is obtained by calling .
The requested thumbnail size in pixels. This value cannot be larger than 1024.
The address of a interface pointer that, when this method returns successfully, receives the object for accessing the requested thumbnail. This parameter can be NULL.

param.name: pOutFlags
param.para: A pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives a combination of the following flags. This value can be set to NULL if this information is not needed.
0x00000001. Set when the returned bitmap dimensions are less than cxyRequestedThumbSize.
0x00000002. Set when the returned image is in the cache.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The Shell item does not support thumbnail extraction. For example, .exe or .lnk items.
The extraction took longer than the maximum allowable time. The extraction was not completed.
A surrogate process was not available to be used for the extraction process.
The WTS_FASTEXTRACT flag was set, but fast extraction is not available.

member.name: IThumbnailCache
member.summary: Exposes methods for a system thumbnail cache that is shared across applications.
